subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chivas USA rookie Jonathan Bornstein turned out to be the biggest bargain in Major League Soccer this season, costing roughly $10 for each minute the former U.C.L.A. standout played.
snippet: Chivas USA rookie Jonathan Bornstein turned out to be the biggest bargain in Major League Soccer this season, costing roughly $10 for each minute the former U.C.L.A. standout played.
